entry.title: HTTP Client update
entry.summary: An update of the HTTP Client specification has been published. The namespaces have been adapted to the standard, some errors have been added, the serialization mechanism is based on the XSLT and XQuery serialization spec now, and a "revision markup" version, highlighting differences, has been created.

entry.title: Packaging update
entry.summary: An update of the packaging specification has been published. The section "Concepts" has been rewritten, making clear distinction between concepts and the package descriptor format. A complete example has been added too. And a "revision markup" version, highlighting differences, has been created.

entry.title: ZIP Facility
entry.summary: First release of the ZIP facility module. The specification has not been written yet, but a prototype implementation exists for Saxon, and some infos about the interface are available here and there. See the module page for details.

entry.title: Packaging update
entry.summary: An update of the packaging specification has been published, as well as a new implementation for Calabash and an updated implementation for Saxon.

entry.title: Packaging starts here
entry.summary: The prototype for eXist of the Packaging System has just been released.

entry.title: Hey!
entry.summary: The website has just been announced on various mailing lists. I hope people will subscribe to the mailing list and will provide valuable input and feedback.

entry.title: A new birth
entry.summary: The website has just been launched. Hello, world!
